info.title: OpenText Extended ECM
info.description: OpenText Extended ECM is an enterprise content management platform that securely governs the information lifecycle by integrating with leading enterprise applications, such as SAP®, Microsoft® 365, Salesforce and SAP SuccessFactors®. You can bring content and processes more together by combining it in your low code solutions and provide access to information when and where it is needed which improves decision-making and drives operational effectiveness. Also works with OpenText Content Server.
